LINK_NAVIGATION.MESSAGE:
{url}

Are you sure you want to open this 3rd party page in your default browser?

WOWUP_UPDATE.INSTALL_MESSAGE: Vil du restarte WowUp for å installere oppdateringen?
WOWUP_UPDATE.NOT_AVAILABLE: Latest version of WowUp is already installed
WOWUP_UPDATE.PORTABLE_DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE:
Do you want to manually download the latest portable version?

You will need to close the app manually and copy over the new version.
WOWUP_UPDATE.SNACKBAR_TEXT: en ny versjon av WowUp er tilgjengelig

ERRORS.ADDON_SCAN_ERROR: An error occurred matching your addon folders with {providerName}, please try again later.
ERRORS.ADDON_SYNC_ERROR: An error occurred checking for updates from: {providerName}
ERRORS.CHANGE_PROVIDER_ERROR: Failed to change provider for {addonName} to {providerName}
ERRORS.GITHUB_LIMIT_ERROR:
You have reached your GitHub API limit of {max} requests.
Please wait until {reset} and try again.
ERRORS.GITHUB_REPOSITORY_FETCH_ERROR:
Failed to check updates for {addonName}.
Please verify that the repository is correct or set this addon to be ignored.

ADDON_DETAILS.DEPENDENCY_TEXT: This addon has {dependencyCount} required {dependencyCount, plural, one{dependency} other{dependencies}}

INSTALL_FROM_URL.DESCRIPTION: Hvis du vil installere en utvidelse direkte fra en URL kan du lime den inn i feltet nedenfor.

ERROR.ASSET_NOT_FOUND:
No asset was found to download {message}.

A valid zip file is required to be in the release in order for WowUp to download it.
ERROR.CLASSIC_ASSET_NOT_FOUND:
No asset was found to download from {message}.

A valid zip file ending with '-classic' is required in order for WowUp to download it.
ERROR.FAILED_TO_CONNECT: Cannot connect to API, please wait a bit and try again.
ERROR.INSTALL_FAILED:
Something went wrong when trying to install the addon, please try again.

If this message keeps showing up, you can get help on Discord in the #wowup-support channel.
ERROR.INVALID_URL:
The given value is not a valid URL. Examples of valid addon URLs are:
	- https://github.com/teelolws/Altoholic-Retail
	- https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25610-8.3-014.html
	- https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/altoholic
ERROR.NO_ADDON_FOUND:
No addon was found, make sure your URL is pointing to the correct page.

When installing from github, please make sure the repository has a release tag with a zip archive containing the addon.
ERROR.NO_RELEASE_FOUND:
No releases were found for {message}.

Valid release with zip file assets are required for WowUp to download it.
ERROR.TITLE: Addon Installation Failed

INSTALL_FROM_URL.TITLE: Installer Utvidelse fra URL

TELEMETRY.DESCRIPTION: Hjelp meg med å forbedre WowUp ved å sende anyonyme data og feilmeldinger?
TELEMETRY.TITLE: WowUp Telemetri

MY_ADDONS.ADDON_IS_CODE_REPOSITORY: Addon appears to be a code repository

CHANGE_ADDON_PROVIDER_CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE: Do you want to change the addon provider for {addonName} to {providerName}? This operation will uninstall your existing addon and replace it with a copy from the new provider.
CHANGE_ADDON_PROVIDER_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Change Addon Provider?

PAGE_CONTEXT_FOOTER.VIEW_GITHUB: Check out the code on GitHub
PAGE_CONTEXT_FOOTER.VIEW_GUIDE: Check out our guide to see what WowUp can do

MY_ADDONS.RESCAN_FOLDERS_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Skann klientens mapper etter installerte utvidelser
MY_ADDONS.RESCAN_FOLDERS_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: Ved å skanne på nytt kan utvidelsesinformasjonen bli resatt imens vi prøver å finne ut av hva du har installert. Dette kan ta et øyeblikk.

UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_ACTION_EXPLANATION: Dette vil fjerne alle relaterte mapper fra din World of Warcraft-mappen din.
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_LESS_THAN_THREE: Er du sikker på at du vil fjerne disse {count} utvidelsene?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_MORE_THAN_THREE: Er du sikker på at du vil fjerne {count} utvalgte utvidelser?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_ONE: Er du sikker på at du vil fjerne {addonName}?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.DEPENDENCY_MESSAGE: {addonName} has {dependencyCount} {dependencyCount, plural, one{dependency} other{dependencies}}. Do you want to remove them also?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.TITLE: Avinstaller {count, plural, =1{Utvidelse} other{Utvidelser}}?

MY_ADDONS.UPDATE_ALL_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Oppdater alle utvidelser for denne klienten

ENABLED_PROVIDERS.DESCRIPTION: Select which providers may be used to search for, and install new addons

APPLICATION.ENABLE_SYSTEM_NOTIFICATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Aktiver/Deaktiver forskjellige systemvarsler, foreksempel: automatisk oppdatering av addons.
APPLICATION.MINIMIZE_ON_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_MAC: Når WowUp-vinduet lukkes, minimer til menylinjen.
APPLICATION.MINIMIZE_ON_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_WINDOWS: Når WowUp-vinduet lukkes, minimer til oppgavelinjens varselområde.
APPLICATION.SCALE_DESCRIPTION: Change zoom factor for entire app.
APPLICATION.SET_LANGUAGE_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: Changing the default language requires the application to restart.
APPLICATION.SET_LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: Select a language to change to
APPLICATION.START_MINIMIZED_DESCRIPTION: ...og vil ikke dukke opp på skjermen din
APPLICATION.START_WITH_SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: WowUp vil startes umiddelbart etter at operativsystemet ditt er lastet...
APPLICATION.TELEMETRY_DESCRIPTION: Hjelp til med å forbedre WowUp ved å sende anonyme data og feilmeldinger.
APPLICATION.THEME_DESCRIPTION: Change the color theme to whatever you like
APPLICATION.TITLE: Applikasjon
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DESCRIPTION: Deaktivering av maskinvareakselerasjon kan løse FPS-problemer og andre renderproblemer i appen. Denne endringen krever en restart
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DISABLE_CONFIR: Deaktivering av maskinvareakselerasjon krever at du restarter programmet.
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_ENABLE_CONFIRM: Aktivering av maskinvareakselerasjon krever at du restarter programmet.

DEBUG.DEBUG_DATA_DESCRIPTION: Loggfør debugdata for å hjelpe til med å diagnotisere eventuelle problemer. Hvis du er nyskgjerrig kan du finne dette i din siste loggfil.
DEBUG.LOG_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Åpne mappen som inneholder dine siste loggfiler.
DEBUG.TITLE: Debug

WOW.AUTO_UPDATE_DESCRIPTION: Nye utvidelser du installerer vil bli satt til å oppdateres automatisk

CLEAR_INSTALL_LOCATION_DIALOG.MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to clear the install path for {clientName}? This will remove all stored addon information for this client.

Your addon folders will not be removed.
